metadata.title: CVE-2021-31807 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.15 and 5.x before 5.0.6. An integer overflow problem allows a remote server to achieve Denial of Service when delivering responses to HTTP Range requests. The issue trigger is a header that can be expected to exist in HTTP traffic without any malicious intent.

criterions.comment: squid package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.13-1ubuntu4.1').
